title: Switch landing page images from local uploads to provided GitHub raw URLs

requirements.summary: Replace centralized landing image paths with the 7 provided GitHub raw JPEG URLs mapped to the correct LANDING_IMAGES keys.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/constants/landingImages.ts contains exactly 7 URLs, all pointing to the provided https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Automation8248/Digi-affiliate-blog-/main/images/provadent/*.jpeg resources

All LANDING_IMAGES keys (hero, solution, benefitsStrip1, benefitsStrip2, ingredients, testimonials, strongCta) resolve to valid https://raw.githubusercontent.com/... URLs (no /assets/uploads/* references remain in this module)

file_operations.description: Replace all /assets/uploads/* values with exactly these 7 GitHub raw URLs mapped to the existing keys: benefitsStrip1=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Automation8248/Digi-affiliate-blog-/main/images/provadent/images%20(1)%20(2).jpeg, solution=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Automation8248/Digi-affiliate-blog-/main/images/provadent/images%20(1)%20(3).jpeg, ingredients=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Automation8248/Digi-affiliate-blog-/main/images/provadent/images%20(1)%20(4).jpeg, benefitsStrip2=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Automation8248/Digi-affiliate-blog-/main/images/provadent/images%20(1)%20(5).jpeg, testimonials=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Automation8248/Digi-affiliate-blog-/main/images/provadent/images%20(1)%20(6).jpeg, hero=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Automation8248/Digi-affiliate-blog-/main/images/provadent/images%20(1)%20(7).jpeg, strongCta=https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Automation8248/Digi-affiliate-blog-/main/images/provadent/images%20(1)%20(8).jpeg. Ensure the module contains exactly 7 URLs and no /assets/uploads references.

requirements.summary: Ensure all landing page sections use LANDING_IMAGES (no hardcoded legacy upload paths) so the new URLs load everywhere images appear.
acceptanceCriteria: No landing page section component hardcodes any of the old /assets/uploads/* image paths
After the change, all images visible on the landing page load successfully at runtime using the new GitHub raw URLs (no broken images)

file_operations.description: Audit and ensure the hero image is sourced exclusively from LANDING_IMAGES.hero, with no direct /assets/uploads/* strings present. Do not change any Buy Now CTA label or redirect behavior.

Audit and ensure the solution section image is sourced exclusively from LANDING_IMAGES.solution, with no direct /assets/uploads/* strings present. Do not change any Buy Now CTA label or redirect behavior.

Audit and ensure both benefits strip images are sourced exclusively from LANDING_IMAGES.benefitsStrip1 and LANDING_IMAGES.benefitsStrip2, with no direct /assets/uploads/* strings present. Do not change any Buy Now CTA label or redirect behavior.

Audit and ensure the ingredients section image is sourced exclusively from LANDING_IMAGES.ingredients, with no direct /assets/uploads/* strings present. Do not change any Buy Now CTA label or redirect behavior.

Audit and ensure the testimonials supporting image is sourced exclusively from LANDING_IMAGES.testimonials, with no direct /assets/uploads/* strings present. Do not change any Buy Now CTA label or redirect behavior.
Audit and ensure the strong CTA image is sourced exclusively from LANDING_IMAGES.strongCta, with no direct /assets/uploads/* strings present. Do not change any Buy Now CTA label or redirect behavior.
